TEXT.TITLE: SSMC <SSM> FORMS ELECTRICAL PRODUCTS DIVISION
TEXT.BODY: SSMC Inc said it formed a separate division to consolidate the manufacture and marketing of its motors for the appliance, computer and automotive industries. SSMC was spun-off from Singer Co <SMF> in July and operates the former sewing machines and furniture businesses of Singer. Reuter
